ChatterExtensionConfig.name: ChatterExtensionConfig
ChatterExtensionConfig.description: Configuration for the Chatter extension for Experience Cloud sites.

CanCreate.description: Determines whether the ChatterExtension can create an instance that appears by rendering.

CanRead.description: Determines whether the ChatterExtension can be viewed.

NetworkId.description: The ID of the Experience Cloud site where the ChatterExtension is deployed.

Position.description: The position of the ChatterExtension icon in the Chatter publisher.
